detailed_results.reasoning: Gold states the management system can ensure always not(valid_request_rejected). This is not equivalent to never rejecting a valid request; it changes the proposition and the overall structure (implication to false).

detailed_results.input: It is not the case that robots 1, 2 and 3 have a strategy to enforce globally position 1.
detailed_results.reasoning: The input and gold formula negate the coalition’s ability: it is NOT the case that <<Robot1,Robot2,Robot3>> can enforce G pos1. The prediction omits the leading negation, asserting they DO have such a strategy, which is the opposite meaning.

detailed_results.input: The world’s stable now. People are happy; they get what they want, and they never want what they can’t get. They’re well off; they’re safe; they’re never ill; they’re not afraid of death; they’re blissfully ignorant of passion and old age; they’re plagued with no mothers or fathers; they’ve got no wives, or children, or lovers to feel strongly about; they’re so conditioned that they practically can’t help behaving as they ought to behave.
detailed_results.reasoning: Gold states only that the World can guarantee stability always (<<World>>G stable). The prediction instead asserts a conjunction of always-not properties (no fear/greed/illness/death/ignorance) and omits the stable proposition. This changes the expressed property substantially.

detailed_results.input: If we wish to fight, the enemy can be forced to an engagement even though he be sheltered behind a high rampart and a deep ditch. All we need do is attack some other place that he will be obliged to relieve.
detailed_results.reasoning: Prediction changes both structure and meaning. The gold is a plain implication with antecedent (sheltered_high_rampart && sheltered_deep_ditch) and consequent attack_other_place, with coalition <<We>> only on the whole formula. The prediction introduces a different antecedent (weak_defense), adds an extra conjunct enemy_relies, and changes scoping/precedence by placing <<We>> only on attack_other_place while conjoining enemy_relies outside the coalition. These are not semantic-preserving deviations.
